textBeforeTable: Please use the chart below to convert between standard size formats Size Conversion Chart Browse and buy women's Rundholz clothing online at Jules B today... Experimenting with textures, shapes and cuts to create innovative pieces for everyday wear, Studio Rundholz aim to set the wearer apart via their own unique look. Timeless pieces that are reworked season after season, statement dresses stay true to the brand's identity with voluminous shapes, whilst Rundholz tops play with balance and shape. The label continue to develop their seasonal ranges through three main collections; Rundholz Mainline, Rundholz Dip and Rundholz Black Label. 'Comfort meets fashion' is the brand ethos of womenswear designers Rundolz. Their understated style is feminine, individual and will certainly get you noticed for all of the right reasons. Rundholz clothing have their own quiet yet strong identity which is fresh, fashion forward and feisty. Their timeless, transitional pieces will fit in perfectly with any wardrobe.
